name: Rock Simulator 2
description:
BECOME WHAT YOU HAVE IMAGINED

Earn, find, and collect over 100 unique rocks!

LEVELING

Increase your leveling speed by unlocking and leveling up your rocks!

MULTIPLAYER

Relax with friends in any environment to enjoy the sunset together!

WEATHER

Create your own custom weather presets to create the exact mood you want to enjoy!

AMBIENCE

Listen to the rain or groove along to your meditative music tracks!

LEADERBOARD

Who will exist the longest? Idle your way to the top of the leaderboard and show off your hard-earned levels!

PUZZLES

What are the rocks hiding? Be the first to find them to get to the top of the leaderboard!
